name: ChangeLightBulb
bt_task: The robot task is to replace a broken light bulb with a new one. The behavior logic of a robot should be as follows. A broken light bulb is attached to a reading lamp which is on the coffee table. The broken light bulb is at a certain distance from the table, not directly on the table. A new light bulb is placed on the coffee table. The robot needs to detach the broken light bulb from the reading lamp and attach the new light bulb to the reading lamp. The goal is to ensure that the reading lamp is attached to the new light bulb and not to the broken light bulb.

Move_to_coffee_table.description: The robot moves to the location of the coffee_table.

Place_broken_light_bulb_on_table.description: The robot places the broken light bulb in its gripper on the coffee table.

Grasp_new_light_bulb.description: The robot grasps the new light bulb with its one gripper.

Attach_new_light_bulb.description: The robot rotates the new light bulb in its gripper to install it to the reading lamp. And releates its gripper.

condition_node.Is_near_coffee_table?: Check if the robot is near the coffee table. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.Reading_lamp_is_attached_with_nothing?: Check if the reading lamp is attached with nothing.
condition_node.new_light_bulb_in_gripper?: Check if the new light bulb is in the robot's gripper.
condition_node.New_light_bulb_is_attached_to_reading_la: Check if the new light bulb is attached to the reading lamp.
